content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Roma 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Roma 0.
Federico Fazio (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gabi (Atlético de Madrid).
Foul by Stephan El Shaarawy (Roma).
Lucas Hernández (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 2, Roma 0. Kevin Gameiro (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Antoine Griezmann with a through ball.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) because of an injury.
Second yellow card to Bruno Peres (Roma) for a bad foul.
Foul by Bruno Peres (Roma).
Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Hand ball by Edin Dzeko (Roma).
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Lucas Hernández tries a through ball, but Fernando Torres is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Radja Nainggolan (Roma) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aleksandar Kolarov with a cross.
Substitution, Roma. Stephan El Shaarawy replaces Maxime Gonalons.
Attempt blocked. Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Ángel Correa.
Attempt missed. Saúl Ñíguez (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Attempt saved. Fernando Torres (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin Gameiro.
Substitution, Roma. Gregoire Defrel replaces Gerson.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Roma 0. Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Attempt saved. Bruno Peres (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Kevin Gameiro replaces Yannick Carrasco.
